title: Hold On

Oh It’s right there inside of

When this life is dramatic

In your heartbeat

When the world tryin

To keep you down low

You can love your

Dream or let it go

You know what you want

Tell me what your waitin' for



If I learned only one thing

If you’re scared than your

Never gonna know

Than before (Let’s go come on)

If you just believe

That the light will shine down

Woo ah

Anything you want

You can have it right now



Hold on when you

Might be falling

Wait until you

Find your moment yeah
